content.description:
Propaganda poster of the French Communist party, circa 1950Private Collection/Bridgeman Images

The text reads: “American occupation is war” and “Let us free France from the Atlantic pact!”
content.question: The stance of the French Communist party in the propaganda poster is best explained by

choices.label: fears created by the Soviet occupation of Eastern Europe
Soviet efforts to undermine Western governments during the Cold War
Soviet aid to rebels in French Algeria and Indochina
French fears of a reunited Germany

content.answer: Soviet efforts to undermine Western governments during the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
